title: MediConfusion: Can you trust your AI radiologist? Probing the reliability of multimodal medical foundation models
details: MS Sepehri, Z Fabian, M Soltanolkotabi… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) have tremendous potential to improve the accuracy, availability, and cost-effectiveness of healthcare by providing automated solutions or serving as aids to medical professionals. Despite promising …
